ThingDef.Name: Xedos_Equilibrium_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona equilibrium
ThingDef.description: "Equilibrium" is a short-range ultra-tech energy weapon. Has rather long recharge time due to possible overheating, but possesses a great firepower. A truly fearsome close quarter combat weapon. in the hands of a skilled shooter.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_Aesa_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona aesa p40
ThingDef.description: Pseudo-Scout Rifle, "Aesa P40" is a compact highly focused microwave emiter. though not very efficient in short or medium-range, it can be absolutely devastating when used in long-range. Illegal and oficially not produced anymore, due to a "Treaty of Ashes" signed in 5456.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_Tyrant_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona ss3-tyrant
ThingDef.description: An ultra-tech light machine gun. Utilize monosteel sharpened bullets to shred apart any and all targets. Somehow inaccurate. However it great firepower make it more than effective, especially against heavy armored targets. Considered as one of the most lethal and painful weapons by many Glitterworld societies.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_Shiver_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Frostmourne
ThingDef.description: An ultra-tech cyro-laser assault rifle. Utilizes mechanics of cyro-negative energy conservation to generate and fire freezing laser beams. The Cyro energy conservation is a rather controversial topic among many modern scientists, mostly due to a fact that coldness doesn't quite work that way as it is not energy, but rather the lack of it. However, it works... somehow, so maybe it is better to not question this more than necessary.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_BlazeSF_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona blaze-slashfire
ThingDef.description: A compact ultra-tech handgun, precise in short-range and with built-in quickdraw mechanics allowing for quick response to any hostilites due to it very low aiming time. Comes with a blade attachment, this variant ultilizes components that charge it with plasma.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_GlacialSF_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona glacial-slashfire
ThingDef.description: A compact ultra-tech handgun, precise in short-range and with built-in quickdraw mechanics allowing for quick response to any hostilites due to it very low aiming time. Comes with a blade attachment, this variant ultilizes components that charge it with stasis.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_Oberon_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona oberon-novangard
ThingDef.description: An Ultra-Tech crossrifle. Fires belts, injected with highly potent neurotoxin that greatly reduces target's blood pumping, sight, and limb manipulation capability. Much more accurate than a traditional crossbow, and capable of firing faster as well, thanks to its aiming system and the lack of need to string it.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_Judgement_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona vox4 judgement
ThingDef.description: An Ultra-Tech Shotgun. Utilizes explosive bullets. Deals extremely heavy damage to target and everyone close to it. Possesses a rather low accuracy and range, but at the same time has enough firepower to kill multiple people in one or two shots if fired correctly.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_Paladin_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona vult-8 paladin
ThingDef.description:
An Ultra-Tech pulse rifle. Fires a long spear shaped energy projectile made out of hard light, capable of easily piercing most forms of conventional armor. Great at medium and long range. Hard Light is a compressed form of light, that behaves like any other conventional bullet with the difference that it burns instead of dealing kinetic damage.

I walk among the bloodied fields
Waving my righteous flag
Hear! ye sinners, murderers, swine
I Bear the Holy Spear of Retribution!
It strikes pure and true!
Blessed by fountains of Holy Grace,
And touched by the blessed hands of God
I wield this mighty weapon to cleanse all
May the filth be washed away with its light!
Holy Cleansing Light! It wipes out all who sin!
An Angelic Spear! The Blazing Sword!
I've been granted the greatest gift
and the most blessed task.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_BFaith_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona blinding faith
ThingDef.description: A high-tech assault rifle, fires bullets made out of superdense plasma to melt foes down. Light with medium accuracy. Rarely used by any official Glitterworld millitary due to its tendency to burn things down.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_Unleashed_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona charge blaster
ThingDef.description: An Ultra-Tech charged-blaster, unlike classic pulse-charge technology that charges each shot with unstable energy, this weapon release a big powerful blast of pure charged energy. Fires a single shot at rather short range, and has a rather long recharge time; but makes up for it more than enough just by the merit of it lethality. Developed by Glitterworldy Military Forces, in situations that require extreme firepower.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_SniperRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona si-sniper rifle "Paragon"
ThingDef.description: Paragon is the pinnacle of humanity's engineering when it comes to sniper rifles. Equipped with micro-onboard computer that gives this weapon a semi-intelligence that allows it to fire with inhuman accuracy.Complex ultra-tech firing mechanics built in; allow a fire rate beyond anything that any other known sniperrifle can offer.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Xedos_celsius_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona celsius-v3 fusion rifle
ThingDef.description: An Ultra-tech Fusion rifle, can inflict massive damage to single targets. Possesses a rather short-range, but comes with double energy conservation cores which allow this weapon to switch freely between a Plasma and Stasis energy projectile.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
